column2: "/ci1 2 Perfect timing, Leader! Akhtar and I can't do this alone. Help us subdue the enemy!"
"/ci2 1 We appreciate your help, Leader. It's always encouraging to have you with us. You did well too, Akhtar."

"Tch, there was nothing we could do...
We'd better retreat and regain our footing. Akhtar, get a move on!"
"You can't move, Akhtar? Then relax and leave the rest to me!"
